content: MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Add watch type parameter to logging functions in task.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding watch type parameter
Modify parse_sse_line to log EVERY line received including non-SSE lines
Add logging for successful JSON parsing and missing result fields in parse_sse_line
Add logging for parse failures in parse_sse_line
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after parse_sse_line modifications
Modify process_chunk to log chunk sizes received
Add logging for number of complete lines processed in process_chunk
Add logging for incomplete lines in buffer in process_chunk
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after process_chunk modifications
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings (mid-point check)
Fix any clippy issues following rules (no dead code, no underscore prefixes)
Modify process_watch_stream to log when stream starts
Add logging for total number of chunks received in process_watch_stream
Add logging for when stream ends and why in process_watch_stream
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after process_watch_stream modifications
Add initial HTTP response status logging
Add logging for first chunk to see initial response
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after response debugging additions
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings (final check)
Fix any final clippy issues following rules
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
